title: bAramma nAvibbarADuva
sahitya:
bAramma nAvibbarADuva mukti sAdhanangaLa bEga bEDuva


caraNam 1    kADuva kapi shayanangaLu bEDuva jnAna maNTapadali jODi kUDADuva
    caraNam 2    mUru maneya bhEdavu mADi muttaideNTu mane kaTyADuva
    caraNam 3    puNDarIkAkSa shESana mEle bhUmaNDaladoLage brahmANDavu
    caraNam 4    shanka cakrAnkita purandara viTTalanna jnAna maNTapadalli
